definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: I will clothe the heavens with darkness, and will make sackcloth their covering.
sentences.chinese: 我可使黑暗籠罩諸天，使麻衣掩蔽天際。

sentences.english: Then David and the elders, clothed in sackcloth, fell facedown.
sentences.chinese: 大衛和長老都身穿麻衣，面伏於地。

sentences.english: And came even before the king's gate: for none might enter into the king's gate clothed with sackcloth.
sentences.chinese: 到了朝門前停住腳步，因爲穿麻衣的不可進朝門。

sentences.english: Then David and the elders of Israel, who were clothed in sackcloth, fell upon their faces.
sentences.chinese: 大衛和長老都身穿麻衣，面伏於地。

definition: long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
plain cotton clothing/(literary) the common people
purple qipao gown, the sign of an official position
black clothes/servant (old)/young woman role in Chinese opera, also called 正旦[zheng4 dan4]
robe of a Buddhist priest/ceremonial garment of a Daoist priest/robe of a judge, nun, priest etc/cassock/vestment
